title: Incorrect data in a time range
description: Due to post-processing errors, some NetCDF files have a time period containing bad data. The symptom is discontinuous jump in time, then a return to correct time. For example, the time axis for an affected file might be: 1991, 1992, 1960, 1961, 1962, 1996. Note that the data itself is incorrect, not only the time axis. These faulty datasets will be retracted, corrected, and republished.
